name: queue
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maytapi_whatsapp.
Tool description: Send and receive messages from WhatsApp via Maytapi. It is a stable and reliable solution. See more:  https://maytapi.com/
API description: Retrieve the queue information of a phone using the specified phone ID.

phone_id.description: The ID of the phone for which queue information is to be retrieved.
